name: Gizzmo AI
author: Gizzmo

sections.description:
Revolutionize your affiliate marketing game with Gizzmo, the ultimate AI-powered content creation plugin for WordPress in 44 different languages. We’re all you need to supercharge your affiliate revenue, so you can focus on creating top-notch content. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting out, Gizzmo simplifies the process of crafting compelling, SEO-optimized content that drives revenues. With its intuitive interface and powerful features, Gizzmo empowers you to create high-quality product reviews, comparison articles, listicles, and more in just a few clicks. Say goodbye to the tedious aspects of content creation and hello to a streamlined, profitable affiliate marketing strategy.

Diverse Content Creation

Gizzmo AI enables you to create a wide range of engaging, revenue-driving content, including:

Product Reviews
Publish in-depth product reviews with “Buy” buttons and related product carousels in just two clicks. Gizzmo connects your affiliate links, helping you earn while providing value.

Product Roundups
Publish in-depth product reviews with “Buy” buttons and related product carousels in just two clicks. Gizzmo connects your affiliate links, helping you earn while providing value.

Comparison Articles
Publish in-depth product reviews with “Buy” buttons and related product carousels in just two clicks. Gizzmo connects your affiliate links, helping you earn while providing value.

Listicle Pro-Pics
Create engaging listicles featuring AI-generated or professional images that captivate your audience, driving engagement and showcasing your content in an appealing, easy-to-consume format.

Deals
Discover and share the best Amazon deals on our interactive “Deals” page. Easily upload enticing offers and integrate seamless “Buy” links to ensure your readers enjoy unbeatable prices. Take advantage of our affiliate program to enhance your earnings as your audience shops smart and saves big. Dive into a world of savings and amplify your income with each transaction.

Effortless Monetization

Maximize your revenue potential with Gizzmo’s built-in monetization tools:

  • Strategically Placed CTA Buttons – Encourage user engagement and drive conversions.
  • Seamless Amazon Integration – Automatically import product images and link them to Amazon using your affiliate tag.
  • Dynamic Product Carousels – Showcase products within articles to boost discoverability, with improved product detection and more frequent appearances.
  • Comprehensive Product Overviews – Embed detailed product information and user reviews from Amazon in roundup articles.
  • Affiliate Link Management – Easily customize and manage your Amazon affiliate links.
  • Keyword-Based Affiliate Links – Automatically generate Amazon affiliate links for identified keywords within articles.

Automated SEO Optimization

Gizzmo takes care of SEO, so you can focus on creating great content:

  • Schema Markup – Automatically format articles for enhanced visibility in search results.
  • Smart Internal Linking – Receive suggestions for relevant internal links to improve user experience and SEO, now faster and more accurate.
  • Compliant Link Attributes – Ensure affiliate links are properly tagged to adhere to Google’s guidelines.
  • Optimized Content Structure – Automatically generate SEO-friendly headlines and structure content using H1-H6 tags.
  • Keyword Integration – Seamlessly incorporate target keywords and phrases throughout your articles.
  • Automated Meta Descriptions – Generate relevant meta descriptions for Yoast users (both free and paid versions).

Streamlined Workflow

Gizzmo automates various aspects of content management, saving you time and effort:

  • Intelligent Category Assignment – Automatically assign articles to relevant categories (with the option for manual adjustments).
  • Automatic Article Tagging – Generate relevant tags to enhance content discoverability and SEO.
  • Seamless Image Integration – Automatically embed Amazon product images and easily manage featured images.
  • Automated Excerpt Generation – Create compelling article previews to boost visibility across platforms and search results.
  • Multi-Account Support – Manage multiple domains under a single Gizzmo account.
  • Chrome Extension-Free Option – Create articles without the need for a Chrome extension.
sections.installation:
There are two ways to install the Gizzmo plugin:

Automatic installation

  1. Search for Gizzmo through ‘Plugins > Add New’ interface.
  2. Find the plugin box of Gizzmo and click on the ‘Install Now’ button.
  3. Then activate the Gizzmo plugin.
  4. Follow the step-by-step onboarding process to create your free account.
  5. Create your first content.

Manual installation

  1. Download Gizzmo.
  2. Upload the Gizzmo plugin file through ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ interface or upload Gizzmo folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  3. Activate the Gizzmo plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Follow the step-by-step onboarding process to create your free account.
  5. Create your first content.
sections.faq:
Account Management

How do I upgrade my Gizzmo subscription?

To upgrade your Gizzmo subscription, use the “Upgrade” button in the Gizzmo plugin or on your “My Account” page here. Gizzmo offers several subscription plans with different features and pricing. Upgrading your subscription will unlock additional features and benefits, such as increased content generation limits, access to advanced customization options, and priority support.

Can I use Gizzmo on multiple sites with one account?

Yes! With our latest update, you can now manage multiple domains under a single Gizzmo account. This feature allows for more efficient management of your affiliate marketing efforts across various websites.

How do I cancel my Gizzmo subscription?

To cancel your Gizzmo subscription, go to “My Account” > “CANCEL SUBSCRIPTION”. Please note that canceling your subscription will terminate your access to Gizzmo’s features and benefits at the end of your current billing cycle. Any remaining credits can be used until the end of the month, and the articles you have created will remain yours forever. If you have any questions or need assistance with the cancellation process, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our support team.

Plugin Features

Does Gizzmo support bulk uploads?

We don’t believe in bulk posting. Relying 100% on AI can be misleading, and we strongly recommend a human check on the outcomes. While AI-generated content can be a valuable tool for content creation, it’s essential to maintain human oversight to ensure the quality, accuracy, and relevance of the content. Bulk uploading AI-generated content without human review can lead to issues such as factual inaccuracies, inconsistencies in tone and style, and potential plagiarism. To maintain the highest standards of content quality, we encourage users to review and edit AI-generated content before publishing.

Can I edit Gizzmo-generated content within WordPress editors like Gutenberg or Elementor without losing formatting?

Yes, Gizzmo is compatible with standard WordPress editors. However, it’s advised to edit carefully to maintain formatting. For simple edits, such as changing text, adding images, or adjusting headings, you can use the WordPress editors without issues. However, for more complex changes, such as modifying the layout or structure of the content, direct HTML editing might be necessary to ensure that the formatting remains intact.

Can I use Gizzmo for Amazon affiliate sites in languages other than English?

Yes, Gizzmo now supports content creation in 44 different languages. This multi-language support allows you to create affiliate content for various markets and audiences worldwide.

How do I add my Amazon Affiliate ID in Gizzmo?

To add or remove your Amazon affiliate tag, click on the “ADD/DELETE” button and fill in your data. Gizzmo will automatically integrate your affiliate tag into the relevant product links within the content it generates, ensuring that you receive credit for any resulting sales. You can also update or remove your affiliate tag at any time using the same process.

Additional Features

Can Gizzmo work with Amazon sites in different countries?

Yes, Gizzmo supports all Amazon English-speaking stores, including Amazon.com, Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.ca, Amazon.in, Amazon.sg, and Amazon.com.au. Gizzmo is designed to work seamlessly with these Amazon stores, allowing you to create content tailored to specific markets. We are continuously working on expanding our support to more Amazon stores worldwide and will update our users as new store integrations become available.

Does Gizzmo offer a free trial?

Yes, Gizzmo offers a free version with limited features, allowing users to test the plugin before committing to a paid subscription. The free version includes basic content generation capabilities, such as product reviews and informative articles, with a limited number of monthly credits. Users can upgrade to a paid subscription at any time to unlock additional features, such as product comparisons, listicles, and increased content generation limits.

Support and Resources

Where can I find Gizzmo tutorials or guides?

Tutorials, guides, and additional learning resources can be found on the Gizzmo support site. Our support site features a comprehensive knowledge base with step-by-step tutorials, video guides, and frequently asked questions. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced user, you’ll find resources to help you get the most out of Gizzmo. If you can’t find what you’re looking for, feel free to reach out to our support team for further assistance.

How can I contact Gizzmo customer support for help?

To contact Gizzmo customer support, visit the Gizzmo contact page. You can submit a support ticket, and our friendly support team will get back to you as soon as possible. We strive to provide prompt and helpful assistance to all our users. Additionally, you can find answers to common questions and issues in our knowledge base on the Gizzmo support site.

How can I stay connected with the Gizzmo community?

We invite you to join our vibrant community of Gizzmo users and stay up-to-date with the latest news, tips, and insights. Connect with us through our Facebook group, where you can engage with fellow users, share your experiences, and learn from others. Subscribe to our YouTube channel for helpful video tutorials and product updates. Follow us on Instagram for inspiring content ideas and creative tips. We look forward to connecting with you and helping you succeed with Gizzmo!
sections.changelog:
3.0.2

  • Fix Typo

3.0.1

  • Add ability to delete Deals Posts
  • Increased seo keyword limit from 4 to 6
  • Bug fix for wrong affiliate tag in Deals
  • Bug fix with products discounts in Deals
  • Bug fix for delete affiliate tag
  • Bug fix for Post link in Deals page
  • Bug fix for WEBP support error

3.0.0

  • Completely redesigned UI/UX for improved user experience
  • Added multi-account support: Ability to use multiple domains under a single Gizzmo account
  • Updated pricing structure
  • Introduced new template: Deals page
  • Upgraded internal linking system for faster and more accurate suggestions
  • Enhanced quality of textual content across all article types
  • Improved overall plugin performance and speed
  • Added option to create articles without using the Chrome extension
  • Upgraded product carousel feature with higher product detection and more frequent appearances in articles
  • Introduced new monetization feature: Automatic Amazon affiliate link generation for identified keywords in articles
  • Discontinued the “General” content template
  • Various bug fixes and minor improvements

2.0.7

  • Added Support for 44 languages content creation
    • UI – Added a new dropdown menu to select target language for content creation
  • Free Package, Increased product “Prepare” limit to 10
  • Pro Package, Increased product “Prepare” limit to 30
  • “Prepare” bug fix

2.0.6

  • Minor bug fixes

2.0.5

  • Enhancement for AI Content Creation:
    • Major improvements to all content created with Gizzmo.ai: more natural, more fluid.
    • Faster content creation process.
  • Enhancement for Roundup Content Creation:
    • Roundup Articles: Now support up to 50 products.
    • Roundup HTML Template: Introduced a new HTML template when unselecting Products Rating and Reviews, Products Pros & Cons, and Products List.
  • Enhancement for Listicle Content Creation:
    • Listicle Articles: Now support endless section paragraphs, controlled by the user by adding more and more sections.
  • Product Carousels
    • Product carousels will appear more frequently in all articles.
  • AI Image Creation and Image Placeholders
    • Enhanced the creation of images.
    • Moved image hosting servers to a faster Gizzmo Server.
  • Bug fixes
    • Fixed a bug where posts were not deleted from the Posts tab after creation.
    • Minor bug fixes.

2.0.4

  • Minor fix: Small Typo fix.

2.0.3

  • bug fix: Products list paging issue.

2.0.2

  • Minor bug fixes.

2.0.1

  • Tested up to: 6.5

2.0.0

  • Added new content formats: Comparison Articles and Listicle Articles.
  • Enhanced existing content types with new features and customization options, including:
    • Roundup Articles: Increased the number of products to 50, added AI-generated main image option, and the ability to include or exclude pros & cons and Amazon user ratings.
    • Post Thematic Concepts: Fine-tune the concept and perspective of your articles’ writing style.
    • Word Count Enhancement: Extended content sections to target a range of 1200-1500 words for richer articles.
    • Carousel Feature: Introduced product carousels in general and comparison articles for dynamic product display.
    • Internal Links: Enhanced ability to add internal links across various content types.
    • Call to Action Button: Repositioned in review and comparison articles for improved user engagement.
    • Excerpt Automation: Generate short snippets automatically for blog post previews.
  • UI/UX Enhancements:
    • Posts in Progress Tab: Streamline your workflow by displaying the progress of your articles.
    • Support and Feedback Buttons: Easily accessible support and feedback options integrated into the plugin.
    • Help Section Enhancements: Replaced traditional in-plugin videos with succinct helper lines linked to extended video guides on the support page.
  • Expanded support for all Amazon stores with English interfaces, including Amazon.com, Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.ca, Amazon.in, Amazon.sg, and Amazon.com.au.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Gizzmo AI content plugin allows you to create Amazon affiliate content in just a few clicks.
